alert.note: Alert for Central Walton; Holmes; North Walton; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 31 at 5:41PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Geneva, northeastern Walton, western Holmes and west central Washington Counties through 530 PM CDT... At 441 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles east of De Funiak Springs, moving northwest at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... De Funiak Springs, Samson, Union, Liberty, Live Oak, Paxton, Ponce De Leon, Westville, Hinsons Crossroads, Cluster Springs, Gaskin, Darlington, Arrant Settlement, Logan Field Municipal A/P, De Funiak Spring Airport, Glendale, Millers Ferry, Center Ridge, Knox Hill and Hickory Hill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Walton; Holmes; North Walton; Washington
